name: Infatuation (Visual Novel)
description:
An adaptation of the WattPad book, Infatuation, written by MaskCover.

The town of Rosalind never changes too much. The town has remained often overlooked for towns further in the mountains or the more urban destinations of the area. Sunnersville out shined the town in size, and the mountain towns out shined Rosalind in quaintness. The destination became only used by tourists who needed a restroom stop along the way.

I heard new blood in the town always causes change...

This game has graphic depictions of kidnapping, breaking in, non-consensual drugging, mention of drugs, mentions of severe violence, school fights, death, gunshots, stalking, abuse and manipulation. Player discretion is advised.
